snippet: China and South Korea on Thursday agreed measures that will expand the use of China's tightly controlled currency and boost trade as Xi Jinping made his first presidential visit to the Korean Peninsula....

headline.print_headline: China, South Korea Agree to Boost Economic Ties
headline.main: China, South Korea Agree to Boost Economic Ties

lead_paragraph: China and South Korea on Thursday agreed measures that will expand the use of China's tightly controlled currency and boost trade as Xi Jinping made his first presidential visit to the Korean Peninsula.
